post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 PHM Search Group

주소 Canada Ontario  
  Milton

홈페이지  

회사소개 Placement Agency


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 Web programmer

고용형태 Permanent, Full Time  

모집기간  As soon as possible

급여 $52,000.00 to $55,000.00 Yearl

근무지 Canada   Ontario Milton  


지원자격
학력 Completion of college  

자격증 Certified Computer Programmer (CCP), Certified Engineering Technologist (CET), Information Systems P

경력 3 - 5 years

필요한기술 Global automotive manufacturing leader is seeking a highly technical and interpersonal Web Prog/Analyst. Must meet the following requirements for consideration: ýMin.of three years working with relational db and programming in a GUI environment ýExperience working in a manufacturing environment, preferably automotive, Inter/intranet development ý HTML, DHTML, ASP, VBScript, Javascript, RDBMS ý MS SQLServer, SQL, T-SQL, Visual Basic, VBA, MS Access, Com, Active X.asp.net using VB.net

기타 Operating Systems: Environment - Centralized, Environment - Client/Server, MS Windows 95/98/NT/2000, MS Windows CE
Hardware Environment: IBM PC and compatibles, Digital workstations
Programming Languages: ASP, COM / COM+ / DCOM / MTS / ActiveX, HTML, DHTML, Java Script, Visual Basic, VB Script
Management Systems (erp or db): MS Access, MS SQL Server, SAP (FI/CO / HR / MM / OT SD)
Communication Protocols: Ethernet, LAN



지원방법
지원방법 By E-mail  

담당자

post.title: Web programmer
